title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project item is not.
EB: Both the Open Project menu item and the Close Project item should be available when selecting both P1 and P2.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Go to the Navigator.
3. Select both P1 and P2.
4. Observe that the Open Project menu item is available.
5. Observe that the Close Project item is not available.
